SELECT MPM.PO_NO , MPD.PO_SEQ , MPM.PO_TITLE , MPM.PO_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_PO_TYPE_NAME(MPM.COMPANY_CD, MPM.DIVISION_CD, MPM.PO_TYPE) FROM DUAL) AS PO_TYPE_NM , MPD.ITEM_ID , TO_CHAR(MPM.PO_DUE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PO_DUE_DATE , MPD.DELIVER_CONFIRM_DATE , MPD.CONFIRM_QTY AS PO_QTY , MPM.CURRENCY_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPM.COMPANY_CD, MPM.DIVISION_CD, 'SM0017', MPM.CURRENCY_CD, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS CURRENCY_NM , MPD.UNIT_PRICE , MPM.EXCHANGE_RATE , MPD.AMOUNT , MPD.LOCAL_AMOUNT , MI.PURCHASE_UNIT , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MI.COMPANY_CD, MI.DIVISION_CD, MI.PURCHASE_UNIT) FROM DUAL) AS PURCHASE_UNIT_NM , MPD.DEPARTURE_LOCATION_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_LOCATION_NAME(MPD.COMPANY_CD,MPD.DIVISION_CD,MPD.DEPARTURE_LOCATION_CD) FROM DUAL) AS DEPARTURE_LOCATION_NM , MPM.PAYMENT_METHOD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPM.COMPANY_CD, MPM.DIVISION_CD, 'MM0006', MPM.PAYMENT_METHOD, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS PAYMENT_METHOD_NM , MPM.PRICE_TERMS , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPM.COMPANY_CD, MPM.DIVISION_CD, 'MM0007', MPM.PRICE_TERMS, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS PRICE_TERMS_NM , MPM.PAYMENT_TERMS , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPM.COMPANY_CD, MPM.DIVISION_CD, 'MM0008', MPM.PAYMENT_TERMS, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS PAYMENT_TERMS_NM , MPM.SHIPPING_METHOD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPM.COMPANY_CD, MPM.DIVISION_CD, 'MM0009', MPM.SHIPPING_METHOD, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS SHIPPING_METHOD_NM , MPM.CREATE_DATE AS PO_CREATE_DATE , MPM.CREATE_BY AS PO_USER_NO , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_USER_NAME(MPM.COMPANY_CD, MPM.DIVISION_CD, MPM.CREATE_BY) FROM DUAL ) AS PO_USER_NM , MPM.CREATE_DEPT_CD AS PO_DEPT_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_DEPARTMENT_NAME(MPM.COMPANY_CD, MPM.DIVISION_CD, MPM.CREATE_DEPT_CD) FROM DUAL) AS PO_DEPT_NM , TO_CHAR(MPM.CONFIRM_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CONFIRM_DATE , MI.ITEM_NM , MI.ITEM_SPEC , MPD.TEST_REPORT_FLAG , MPD.IQC_FLAG , MI.MAKER , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPD.COMPANY_CD, MPD.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0007', MI.MAKER, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS MAKER_NM , MPM.VENDOR_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_PARTNER_NAME(MPM.COMPANY_CD,MPM.DIVISION_CD,MPM.VENDOR_CD) FROM DUAL) AS VENDOR_NM , MPD.PURCHASE_ORDER_ID , MPD.PURCHASE_ORDER_ID AS KEY_ID , MPD.COMPANY_CD , MPD.DIVISION_CD FROM MOM_PO_MST MPM , MOM_PO_DTL MPD , MOM_ITEM MI , MOM_PO_CATEGORY MPC WHERE MPM.COMPANY_CD = MPD.COMPANY_CD AND MPM.DIVISION_CD = MPD.DIVISION_CD AND MPM.PO_NO = MPD.PO_NO AND MPM.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MPM.DIVISION_CD = MI.DIVISION_CD AND MPD.ITEM_ID = MI.ITEM_ID AND MPM.COMPANY_CD = MPC.COMPANY_CD AND MPM.DIVISION_CD = MPC.DIVISION_CD AND MPM.PO_TYPE = MPC.PO_TYPE
AND MPM.VENDOR_CD = #{vendorCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- 로그인업체고정
AND MPM.DO_INVOICE_YN = 'Y' AND MPC.MARKET_CD = 'D' AND MPD.STATE = 'POR' AND MPM.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPM.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPD.PO_RECEIVE_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{receiveDateSD, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{receiveDateED, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 0.99999
AND (UPPER(MPM.PO_NO) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{poNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND (UPPER(MI.ITEM_ID) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{itemIdNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR UPPER(MI.ITEM_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{itemIdNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND MPM.CREATE_BY = #{poUserCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY MPD.COMPANY_CD , MPD.DIVISION_CD , MPD.PURCHASE_ORDER_ID
